item.description:
Thank-you to those who answered my poll about Grab A Date:


PS: Be aware that I can not guarantee the women to men ratio so please don't expect to walk away with a date however Im sure you will make some new friends. Bringing any and all your singles friends is highly encouraged!

From Single in the "City" Women's Social Group

I KNOW THIS GROUP HAS SEVERAL ELLIGIBLE MEN SO PLEASE DONT BE SHY - THIS WILL BE A BLAST!

We'll be meeting in their upstairs bar starting at 6:30 PM. Lir Irish Pub is located at 903 Boylston St in Boston (617) 778-0089. The closest T stop is the Hynes Station. We have the upstairs bar to ourselves until 10 pm although people are welcome to stay and play after that.


For those who have no idea what a Grab A Date Is:

A grab-a-date is when you grab a guy/girl friend who you think is GREAT (but are not romantically involved with) and bring them along

If you're not sure you have a guy/girl to bring, reach out to someone at your gym, or from work, or that cute guy/girl from a dating site that you just didn't feel that chemistry but you thought was great

If you don't have a anyone to bring, don't sweat it - just bring your cute self and mingle - DONT BE SHY No one bites unless you request them too


PS: Be aware that I can not guarantee the women to men ratio so please don't expect to walk away with a date however Im sure you will make some new friends. Bringing any and all your singles friends is highly encouraged!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be meeting in their upstairs bar which will be ours and ours alone until 10PM
item.why: It was such a blast the first time the second time will only be better! Check out the feed back on the Single in the "City" Women's Social Group if you don't believe me. :)
item.name: Grab a Date in conjunction with Single in the "City" Women's Social Group
